title: Citi Hungary Opens an Exclusive Citigold Center with Digital Features at MOM Park Shopping Mall in Budapest
summary: Budapest, Hungary - Citigold customers now have access to Citibank's world-class priority banking products and services in the new exclusive Citigold Center branch at MOM Park Shopping Mall in Budapest. Located in one of the city's most high profile shopping malls, the Citigold Center uses innovative elements of modern design and technology to enhance the customers' banking experience.
tag-1: Citi Hungary Opens an Exclusive Citigold Center with Digital Features at MOM Park Shopping Mall in Budapest
tag-3: Budapest, Hungary – Citigold customers now have access to Citibank's world-class priority banking products and services in the new exclusive Citigold Center branch at MOM Park Shopping Mall in Budapest. Located in one of the city's most high profile shopping malls, the Citigold Center uses innovative elements of modern design and technology to enhance the customers' banking experience.
tag-4: Marc Luet, Chief Executive Officer of Citi's Consumer Bank in Europe, Middle East and Africa was in Budapest to inaugurate the new branch and to reinforce Citi's commitment to the market and to its customers in Hungary. At the opening ceremony Mr. Luet said, "Retail banking and customer needs have evolved to become far more digital. We believe branch banking should also follow, so we've carefully designed our new Citigold Center around the customer, embracing technology to enhance the experience."
tag-5: Batara Sianturi, Citi Country Officer of Citibank Hungary added, "In line with Citi's global strategy, we are focusing our presence around high traffic metropolitan locations. Building on Citi's 200 years history and unmatched global network and expertise we are bringing in further innovations to offer the best financial solutions for our customers to help them navigate through these challenging times."
tag-6: Jon Wiggins, Consumer Business Manager for Citibank Hungary also remarked, "We have relocated our Hegyalja Street Branch to this high profile shopping mall to make use of the outstanding facilities offered by this building and make it even easier and more convenient for our Citigold customers to access our branch. The huge touch-screen Electronic Media Wall that in addition to featuring Citibank's products and services in an exciting interactive format allows for showing fresh news feeds, stock indexes, FX rates and other information, as well as five LCD Sales Walls with product information will definitely offer a special on-the-go banking experience to our customers."
tag-7: More information about Citibank products and services are available at www.citibank.hu.
tag-8: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.

tag-10: Citibank Hungary With more than a 25-year history of presence, ingenuity and leadership in Hungary, today, Citibank Hungary operates as a unique global bank providing large corporate, small and middle enterprises and individual clients with a wide range of world-class, leading-edge innovative products and services. These include global transactions services, securities and fund services, corporate and investment banking services, treasury services, wealth management, investment products, cards, insurances and loans. The highly skilled team of Citigold personal bankers provides outstanding private banking services to affluent individuals. Citibank Hungary's diversified distribution channels consist of branches across major cities in Hungary, 24/7 CitiPhone banking, Citibank Online internet banking and direct sales/telesales channels.
